DOC.brief_summary: This study designate evaluate pharmacokinetic interaction bisoprolol rosuvastatin healthy male volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Male volunteer age 20 55 year old ( inclusive ) Body mass index ( BMI ) range 18.5 27 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Medically healthy clinically significant vital sign ( sit position blood pressure , pulse rate ) ( 90 mmHg ≤ systolic blood pressure ≤ 150 mmHg , 60 mmHg ≤ diastolic blood pressure ≤ 100 mmHg , 50 beat per minute ≤ pulse rate ≤ 100 beat per minute ) Available entire study period Understand requirement study voluntarily consent participate study Subjects history gastrointestinal disease might significantly change ADME ( Absorption , Distribution , Metabolism Excretion ) medicine History clinically significant arrhythmic , peripheral vascular , thyroid , bronchospasm , asthma disease Subjects anaphylaxis bisoprolol and/or rosuvastatin History drug abuse History caffeine , alcohol , smoke abuse caffeine ( coffee , tea , coke ) grapefruit juice > 4cups/day smoking > 20 cigarettes/day alcohol > 140g/week Clinical laboratory test value outside accept normal range AST ( Aspartate Transaminase ) , ALT ( ALanine Transaminase ) ( > 1.5 time normal range CK ( Creatine Kinase ) > 1.5 time normal range Estimated GFR ( Glomerular Filtration Rate ) < 60 mL/min Subjects whole blood donation within 60days , component blood donation within 30days blood transfusion within 30days prior study medication dose Subjects consider unsuitable base medical judgement investigator
